category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
definition: The Female Sleuth, Type-4 emoji is a sequence of the ?? Sleuth or Spy, ?? Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-4, ? Female Sign and ? Variation S http://emojipedia.org/female-sleuth-type-4/
name: woman detective: medium skin tone
note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman detective with medium skin tone emoji embodies curiosity and sharp intellect, with a thoughtful expression and subtly highlighted features. She is depicted wearing a classic trench coat rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading, complete with realistic lighting that accentuates its fabric and form. The magnifying glass she holds is polished and detailed, its lens appearing to magnify the unseen, symbolizing investigation, problem-solving, and uncovering mysteries within the digital narratives on Apple devices.
